website_summaries.verdict: A solid choice with a compact design that’s easy to fill and keep clean.
pros: Effective control over humidity levels through a knob
Humidifies a small space well for such a small device
cons: Doesn’t last through the night on high
Humming noise that's tolerable for most

customer_reviews.title: Quality problem with fan motor; otherwise a decent little humiodifier
customer_reviews.text: Pros: The unit is compact, quiet (when it works well), and humidifies well in a normal size bedroom. Cons: Difficult to reach all parts inside tank when cleaning. After one season of use, the fan needs to run a while before it is quiet. On a cold start, the fan whines annoyingly until its motor heats up. (This was also a problem in early SPT humidifiers, but isn't a problem in the SPT we use currently in our living room.)
customer_reviews.author: Dangineer

customer_reviews.title: Replacement model works great
customer_reviews.text: Item is defective. Amazon says I can't return it, even though I just bought it and received it today. There is no steam coming out. I've tried everything to troubleshoot. We have the larger model as well, so I know how it should work. Disappointed Update: I contacted Vicks (Kaz is the parent company), and their customer service is amazing. They sent me a new humidifier right away, and it works perfectly. We've used it every night for almost a week straight now with no problems. This is a great little unit for a bedroom. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: MisterMister

customer_reviews.title: Great for a kids room!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little humidifier that doesn't take up an excess amount of space and is very quiet. Light on the front however, is a little bright in a dark room. It's easy enough to stand up a book in front of to block the light, but a consideration none the less. The Vicks inserts for helping stuffy noses are extremely easy to take in/out and do wonders for our kiddo!
customer_reviews.author: Astro21

customer_reviews.title: Concerned about performance
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased this to replace one that was a few years old and started to make a loud noise when I turned it on. My son was excited to get this new one because it was green however this one seems to leak down the front and underneath the unit, I don't think that its normal and I'm afraid the excess water drippage going to ruin the tray its on but concerned to put any thing underneath it to capture the water. Seems like if you spend 40.00 on something it should work properly...
customer_reviews.author: Melissa A.Staples

customer_reviews.title: perfect for sleeping
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. My roommate has one that I was borrowing and I loved it so I bought my own. I wake up in the mornings with my sinuses and chest clear. It's excellent. I don't even use the vicks pads. Just plain tap water! The best part is that I CAN use tap water so no buying gallons of distilled water anymore.
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: Leaks - Don’t buy - can’t return.
customer_reviews.text: Started leaking before I could switch it on. Leaks from the sides. Fact that it is non-returnable was the cherry on the cake. This is the second product I bought from Vicks that doesn’t work. First is that personal steam inhaler which produces only enough steam to perhaps cure a hamster’s cold. I’d generate more steam if I rubbed my palms together. Not buying any more hardware from Vicks. But Amazon customer support was kind enough to process a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Sai Sharath

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my desk!
customer_reviews.text: Just the right size for my already-crowded desk surface at work. I like the volume it holds-- no more refilling three or four times a day as with my previous humidifier. I keep it on the lowest setting and it's just enough. I also like the green color, and it is almost completely silent. I was worried about the possibility of hearing the ultrasonic pitch, which I've noticed with some items, but with this humidifier, I hear only a very quiet fan, almost like a white-noise effect.
customer_reviews.author: M. Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Compact cool humidifier to sooth dry/irritated throat.
customer_reviews.text: This is a cool humidifier. I feel safe leaving this in my bedroom for my kids, it creates a cozy environment and doesn’t allow their throats to get irritated and dry. It’s compact enough for a small nightstand and very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Carleen

customer_reviews.title: Love these - I ended up purchasing two
customer_reviews.text: Sickness struck our house pretty bad this year with head colds and coughs congestion RSV symptoms. We had a newborn/infant and this worked wonders. Was skeptical that without the filter it would end up leaving a white residue on the surface of things in the room it was being used - but its been 4 months and not the case. It replaced our old filtered honeywell humidifier. Bonus perk was that we could add the Vick's scented pads to help when things got really bad.
customer_reviews.author: Christine DiLisio

customer_reviews.title: No more waking up with dried out nose.
customer_reviews.text: Grandson loves it in his room. He thinks the cool mist is like a magic trick. No more waking up with dry stuffed up nose from the dry air when the heat is on.
customer_reviews.author: glen t

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids with asthma
customer_reviews.text: True to color. Exactly what we needed. My son has asthma and has had a lot of difficulties, this has helped a ton! Comes with a place for the vicks pads, so a humidifier and vaporizer!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: For my sons allergies. He set it all up himself (11 years old) and it is working wonders in this FL weather.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Sutton

customer_reviews.title: Quality of the knob
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these. In one of the unit, the knob does not stick to the max. When I move the knob to the max it automatically retracts a little. This makes the unit producing lesser humidity than the max. This problem is in one of the unit that I ordered. I wish it was an easy fix. I expected a better quality. Overall not that bad.
customer_reviews.author: N

customer_reviews.title: I can breathe
customer_reviews.text: Quiet colorful barely notice it in the room really does the job I had a lot less nosebleeds this winter
customer_reviews.author: Barrett Eskridge

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this humidifier. Cute, compact, quiet and powerful. Tank of water lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: PlantMama5

customer_reviews.title: Does its job
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to complain about, it is a good product, no noise and it helps with breathing when you are suffering from flu.
customer_reviews.author: siddharth

customer_reviews.title: Bye nose bleeds!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, no nose bleeds since I bought it for myself and my daughter. Glad I don't have to change any filters.
customer_reviews.author: Cat F.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: No problems like other people had. Worked good effective next to the bed.
customer_reviews.author: honeybunny

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I have it on whenever I am in my room, easy to fill and love the slot for the vicks pads.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Whited

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Molded really quickly and tough to clean. Cleaned it out every other day and it still somehow molded
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So easy to clean!
customer_reviews.text: The best feature of this humidifier is the wide water intake whole, makes it so easy to clean! Also love the oil dispensing feature!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Wandschneider

customer_reviews.title: Great Product - Vick's humidifier
customer_reviews.text: HIghly recommend the Vick's humidifier. The cool mist has been so good that we bought a second one. the range is significant, so we put one in our bedroom and one downstairs.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh Ann von Hoelle

customer_reviews.title: Small but powerful
customer_reviews.text: I like that it's small enough to fit on a nightstand and it produces enough vapor as the larger ones.
customer_reviews.author: twinmomma3

customer_reviews.title: Love this small humidifier
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Small but enough for a bedroom, practically silent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this.
customer_reviews.text: First it came as used product; replacement product won't work. Don't buy this humidifier online.
customer_reviews.author: Soo

customer_reviews.title: Loud.
customer_reviews.text: After 2 times using it it became very loud. We can no longer use at night because of the noise which is when our son needs it the most
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn & Tim

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very happy about both of them we ordered. We ordered a pink and green one!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Newburn

customer_reviews.title: Been using this with and without the Vicks strips and both work excellent so far after 2 weeks of nightly usage
customer_reviews.text: Live in a very dry climate with the average precipitation at 24%. Been using this with and without the Vicks strips and both work excellent so far after 2 weeks of nightly usage. Sit right on my nightstand and goes through about 3/4 of the storage water each night. Very nice and small as my wife has sever asthma issues so I was worried about putting too much moisture in the air, she hast had any negative effects.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Wilfong

customer_reviews.title: Nice color, my son loves the color green
customer_reviews.text: Nice color, my son loves the color green. Works well, makes winters easier to beat. I wish you had a fourth color or just clear.
customer_reviews.author: Terra C.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Lowered this rating as low as I could. In addition to being very hard to clean, the item seems to have completely broken. It’s only been used as intended and this cheap faulty design has proved to be a waste of a purchase. Will be requesting refund
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Top rated by CR
customer_reviews.text: Top rated by CR and for good reason- inexpensive and effective. Cleaning is just so so.. gets stains and not so easy to clean but not terrible. Def would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Steven Boughter

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: Does the job! Can’t really go wrong. Using it for kids bedrooms.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Works but noisy.
customer_reviews.text: Does what it's intended, but quite noisy unless you're used to sleeping next to an aquarium.
customer_reviews.author: 1701-E

customer_reviews.title: Small easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Love this small, easy to clean humidifier. Got rid of my large high maintenance one when I saw these newer ones online. Much nicer
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Coverage
customer_reviews.text: Used in one bedroom. Not sure if I can tell a lot of difference. Highest setting uses up the water in the reservoir very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Roger D.

customer_reviews.title: Works great and last 20hrs if its turned just over 1/2 ...
customer_reviews.text: I looked it up on concumer reports and it was number two. Works great and last 20hrs if its turned just over 1/2 way up
customer_reviews.author: munchkin 422

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works super well and helps my dry throat in the winter! Easy to use and fill
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Huff

customer_reviews.title: Use caution when cleaning!
customer_reviews.text: Worked really well for our son's bedroom. A word of caution: the humidifier tank is very delicate. I had the tank and base separated for a cleaning, and the tank rolled off of the counter and immediately broke apart as it hit the floor. I'm very disappointed because we were only able to use it for 2 nights, and I already need to replace it. 😔
customer_reviews.author: S Wanko

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Little bit loud but I'm use to hearing nothing but other then that perfect and beautiful lil vicks humidifier
customer_reviews.author: A/J Vance

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size humidifier  & love the green color.
customer_reviews.text: A much needed humidifier. Perfect size not too big. Awkward to clean, but manageable. Always keep it clean!
customer_reviews.author: CNB

customer_reviews.title: Mildew smell after each use of not cleaned
customer_reviews.text: I purchased my second one and for some reason this one smells like mildew after one night of use. I purchased the filter free in goes off not having to clean it every day. This makes me not want to use it. I'm wondering if this one is defective.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica L.

product_meta.title: Vicks Mini Filter Free Cool Mist Humidifier Small Humidifier for Bedrooms, Baby, Kids Rooms, Auto-Shut Off, 0.5 Gallon Tank for 20 Hours of Moisturized Air, Use with Vicks VapoPads, Green
product_meta.description: Color:GreenThe Vicks Mini Filter Free Cool Mist Humidifier provides soothing, visible mist for temporary relief of cough and congestion for better breathing and a more comfortable sleep. Designed for low maintenance operation, this unit requires no filters and is ultra quiet.
feature_bullets: VICKS FILTER-FREE COOL MIST HUMIDIFIER: This cool mist humidifier won't need replacement filters, & it's half gallon tank can give up to 20 hours of soothing mist. Vicks mini cool mist humidifier is quiet & small, great for your bedroom or baby's nursery

VICKS HUMIDIFIERS FOR KIDS, ADULTS: This humidifier helps add cool moisture into the air. Many women and men find that a humidifier for the bedroom becomes an essential part of a good night's sleep when the air is dry, in allergy season, or when sick

COUGH & CONGESTION RELIEF: When you or your kid has a cold, it can be difficult to sleep through the night. Humidifiers and vaporizers provide temporary relief from coughing and congestion, so your rest won't be as disturbed by coughing fits

VICKS VAPORIZERS, HUMIDIFIERS, & STEAM INHALERS: Steam & humidity offer temporary relief from cough & congestion due to colds or allergies. Vicks line of humidifiers & steam inhalers, help you breathe easier wherever you are, from the bedroom to office
HUMIDIFIERS FOR BEDROOMS, DESKS,TABLES: Our humidifiers & vaporizers help you breathe better wherever you are.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
